Reviews.Title: “Balconies are locked on the weekends.”
Reviews.Author: brown_betty45
Reviews.Content: booked 2 bedroom apartment couple saturday night check 2pm 230 wait 15 minutes ready receptionist rude checking tried charge credit card twice 200 holding deposit staying 41st floor paid extra sky view balcony doors locked apparently terms conditions access balconies friday saturday nights 5 minutes phone rang told sending maintenance person fix light woman called hung locked balcony maintenance guy arrived ladder told fix shower door started hammering bathroom location stay recommend terrible service balconies locked fine print page 19 hotel guide 100 fee dont wash own plates cutlery kitchen people aware fees

Reviews.Title: “Practical”
Reviews.Author: brownie06
Reviews.Content: stayed meriton pitt street week hotel following reasons rates reasonable clean veiw walking distance tourist attractions dissapointed lukewarm service staff crowded especially lobby poorly equipped kitchen

Reviews.Title: “Great apartment, perfect location”
Reviews.Author: bigtwinky
Reviews.Content: apartment located perfectly pitt street block train station allowing trips bondi 20 minute walk circular quay near shopping pitt street mall near chinatown eats modern clean lots space 2 couples highly recommended loved stay staying

Reviews.Title: “Great price, location and apartment”
Reviews.Author: GCAfricaAddict
Reviews.Content: stayed 4 days late march 2010 skyview 2 bed apartment impressed efficient friendly staff clean spacious amazing view convenient restaurants bars major sights definitely stay return sydney

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous location, excellent value”
Reviews.Author: PCTKL
Reviews.Content: booked 2 bedroom apartment 8 nights reading reviews arrival pleasantly surprised apartment reviews spacious family 4 clean modern location fantastic woolworths corner coles minutes walk chinatown darling harbour walking distance minor complain washing machine broke 2 days departure staff beyond repair rest appliances condition overall satisfied choice hotel definitely recommend friend

Reviews.Title: “The way to stay in Sydney”

Reviews.Content: stayed adult daughter 3 days apartment 65th floor amazing views sydney incredibly spacious equipped superb main bathroom kitchen wish dishwasher washing machine tumble drier staff reception helpful pricey pay lifetime trip sydney fitted bill perfectly
